legal_basis: Section 5 and 6 of the Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations
decision_outcome: Applications for prohibition orders dismissed; costs awarded to respondents.
evidence_provided: contamination of Coniothyrium fuckelii by Aspergillus terreus
significant yield improvements using Coniothyrium fuckelii alone
judicial_authority: Judicial review under Patent Act and Regulations
